name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior ML Engineer with over 10 years of experience in **Machine Learning**, **AI**, and **Data Science**, proficient in **Cloud Computing** and **MLOps**. Skilled in designing and implementing **production systems** and **real-time systems**, including **batch processing** solutions. Highly collaborative with a strong focus on **Agile Development**, **clean code**, and **testing** practices. Demonstrated success in creating scalable and high-performing APIs and automation tools using **Python** frameworks like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, alongside cloud platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Consistently delivered impactful projects for top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, showcasing exceptional **problem-solving** abilities and a commitment to **monitoring** and optimizing system performance.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **cloud computing** expertise to design and deploy scalable machine learning production systems using **Azure App Services** and **Terraform** for infrastructure management, achieving deployment efficiency improvements of **30%**.
Implemented machine learning models and workflows using **Python** within an **Agile Development** framework, enhancing predictive accuracy by **15%**.
Developed real-time data processing systems leveraging **Kafka** for high throughput and low latency, ensuring timely data delivery for real-time analytics.
Created robust data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** for batch processing, improving data processing time by **25%** for regulatory needs.
Executed MLOps practices to streamline machine learning lifecycle management, enhancing collaboration and reducing time to deployment of ML solutions by **20%**.
Conducted rigorous testing and monitoring of production systems to ensure reliability and adherence to clean code principles, resolving operational issues swiftly.
Facilitated cross-functional collaboration to solve complex system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and robustness in machine learning applications.

• Leveraged **Cloud Computing** technologies, deploying machine learning models and data workflows in **Azure App Services** and utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments across **9** deployments.
• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows and streamline user onboarding processes, contributing to a **30%** increase in efficiency.
• Created event-driven **microservices** architecture using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial transactions with an average transaction processing time reduced by **25%**.
• Engineered data pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to facilitate secure exchanges of regulatory data, automating the data flow and achieving compliance standards on **5** major projects.
• Conducted security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards while integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and secure access controls, enhancing security measures by **40%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile Development** environment to ensure seamless system integration and regulatory compliance, leading to successful release management on **10** projects.
• Applied principles of **Clean Code** and extensive **Testing** methodologies to maintain high-quality codebases and facilitate ongoing **Monitoring** of production systems.

• Developed and maintained **production systems** using Python and **Flask**, enabling efficient trade execution and portfolio management to support data-driven decision-making.
• Engineered **real-time systems** for price feed processing utilizing **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, achieving a response time of under **100ms** for high-frequency trading transactions.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile Development** environment to design and implement REST APIs, enhancing user experience and system interaction with up-to-date trading data.
• Ensured compliance with **regulatory standards** including MiFID II and GDPR, while implementing robust **data security protocols** and monitoring for risk management.
• Developed automated test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, increasing code coverage by **30%** and significantly reducing bugs in production.
• Optimized backend task execution and scheduling through the implementation of **job queuing solutions** using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, improving process management and reducing job latency by **25%**.
